scenes.background: You agreed to help your colleague with the urgent task for a short time and will hand it off to someone else later. However, as you're working on it, [Monica] messages you. You replied that you're in the middle of it and will send her the details soon. As you continue working, [Bob] walks over to your desk and says,
scenes.description: 'Hey, I thought you were on leave? Why are you even here?'

options.text: I know, but there was an urgent task that needed immediate attention. I'll be handing it off soon.
options.analysis: You explained the situation clearly, showing good social skills and motivation. However, empathy might be lacking as Bob might feel you're not respecting your own boundaries.

options.text: Yeah, it’s not ideal, but I’m just trying to help out. I’ll be done soon.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the difficulty of the situation, showing good emotional perception and empathy. However, motivation might be lower as you don't seem fully committed to the task.

options.text: I’m only here for a short time to handle something urgent. I'll be gone soon.
options.analysis: You focused on the urgency of the task, showing good self-regulation and motivation. However, social skills could be better as Bob might feel you're brushing off his concern.
